Uses of Class
org.opends.server.protocols.ldap.LDAPControl

  • Packages that use LDAPControl 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.opendj.adapter.server3x
    Classes for interacting with an embedded OpenDJ 2.x instance using the OpenDJ LDAP SDK.
    org.opends.server.protocols.ldap
    Contains the implementation for the Directory Server connection handler that is responsible for interacting with clients using LDAPv3.

    • Uses of LDAPControl in org.forgerock.opendj.adapter.server3x

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static LDAPControl Converters.to​(Control control)
      Converts from OpenDJ LDAP SDK Control to OpenDJ server LDAPControl.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Control Converters.from​(LDAPControl ldapControl)
      Converts from OpenDJ server LDAPControl to OpenDJ LDAP SDK Control.

    • Uses of LDAPControl in org.opends.server.protocols.ldap

      Methods in org.opends.server.protocols.ldap that return LDAPControl 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static LDAPControl LDAPReader.readControl​(ASN1Reader reader)
      Decodes the elements from the provided ASN.1 reader as an LDAP control.
